metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2571 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.0101.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2571` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.13
vim-athena - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.13
vim-common - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.13
vim-gtk - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.13
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.13
vim-gui-common - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.13
vim-nox - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.13
vim-runtime - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.13
vim-tiny - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.13
xxd - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.13').
